ie.gmit.sw.io

Class DataProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.io.DataProcessor

  • public class DataProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for reading data from URLs, or Files locally. Sorts and parses the data into lists and blocks unnecessary words. Sorts the data using the ValueComparator class.
    Author:
    Ronan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataProcessor()
      Gets an instance of the DataReaderFactory, gets the Stopwords, adds the stopwords to a collection

    • Method Summary

      Reads in data from a file.
      java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getSortedWords() 
      java.lang.String getStopWordsFileName() 
      void printSortedWords()
      Prints out the valid words in sorted order.

      Prints out the parsed words (with the unnecessary words removed).

      Uses the ValueComparator class to sort the Map into a Treeset.

      • fileReader

        public void fileReader(java.lang.String fileLocation)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads in data from a file. Returns the result.
        Parameters:
        fileLocation - is the path to the local file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If file is not found

      • urlReader

        public void urlReader(java.lang.String fileLocation)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads in data from a URL. Returns the result. and parses it using a Third party library called JSOUP.
        Parameters:
        inputDataUrlname - is the URL to be retrieved.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - on input error.
        See Also:
        Exception

      • process

        public void process(java.lang.String data)
        Removes punctuation and calls the add word method.
        Parameters:
        data - Data to be processed, split and punctuation removed.

      • addWord

        public void addWord(java.lang.String word)
        Adds a word to the map or else increases its count. Checks words against the stop word list.
        Parameters:
        word - Word to be added, checked against stop words first

      • sortWords

        public void sortWords()
        Uses the ValueComparator class to sort the Map into a Treeset.
